name: An Elephant Can Wear Many Hats
name_original: An Elephant Can Wear Many Hats
description:
A puzzle game made for the first Thinky Puzzle Game Jam.

There are nine levels.

This seems to be a palace, there's elephants in the rooms and they want to be happy. How to make elephants happy? With hats. Party hats specifically. There are other hats, but they do ... other things.
